verses.name: Psalms 22:1
verses.text: My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me? why art thou so far from helping me, and from the words of my roaring?

verses.name: Psalms 22:2
verses.text: O my God, I cry in the daytime, but thou hearest not; and in the night season, and am not silent.

verses.name: Psalms 22:3
verses.text: But thou art holy, O thou that inhabitest the praises of Israel.

verses.name: Psalms 22:4
verses.text: Our fathers trusted in thee: they trusted, and thou didst deliver them.

verses.name: Psalms 22:5
verses.text: They cried unto thee, and were delivered: they trusted in thee, and were not confounded.
